question:
You ordered an item from an online store and it has arrived damaged.
Write a letter to the retailer to complain. In the letter:
– Explain why you are unhappy
– Request a refund
– Make arrangements to return the damaged item
text: I am writing this letter requesting your assistance with my complaint. As you can see from my purchase history I am your loyal customer for five years. I bought a lot of stuff in a wide product range. I was happy with your service since my last experience.

Last week on the 10th of August I ordered a pair of sneakers. On the product details remark as a detail to buy one size bigger than the normal. Because of this , the recommendation I create an order for a size of 44. After delivering and unboxing, firstly I realize that the shoes are damaged moreover they seem not like new. In addition when I tried them the size of the shoes was not suitable for me. Hence I desire a full cashback however you could neglect the delivery charges.
I read the all product return conditions on your website and followed all instructions. That is to ,say I believe you managing this process with a full customer satisfaction experience by all means
I am looking to hearing from you as soon as possible
